data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Murzuq, Libya.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Murzuq, Libya
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Murzuq, Libya to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Murzuq, Libya.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Murzuq.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Murzuq, Libya, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tubu, Teda people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, you gave the church of Murzuq, Libya the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 81,800 citizens of Murzuq, Libya, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Murzuq, Libya to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
